description: Retrieves the enrollment status for an account. It can also return the list of accounts that are enrolled under the organization.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The enrollment status of a specific account ID, including creation and last updated timestamps.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the account enrollment status was last updated.

nested_items.name: createdTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the account enrollment status was created.

nested_items.name: includeMemberAccounts
nested_items.description: The enrollment status of all member accounts in the organization if the account is the management account or delegated administrator.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results.
